options.title: --add-drop-database
options.description: Add DROP DATABASE statement before each CREATE DATABASE statement

options.title: --add-drop-table
options.description: Add DROP TABLE statement before each CREATE TABLE statement

options.title: --add-drop-trigger
options.description: Add DROP TRIGGER statement before each CREATE TRIGGER statement

options.title: --add-locks
options.description: Surround each table dump with LOCK TABLES and UNLOCK TABLES statements

options.title: --all-databases, -A
options.description: Dump all tables in all databases

options.title: --all-databases, -A
options.description: Dump all tables in all databases

options.title: --allow-keywords
options.description: Allow creation of column names that are keywords

options.title: --apply-replica-statements
options.description: Include STOP REPLICA prior to CHANGE REPLICATION SOURCE TO statement and START REPLICA at end of output

options.title: --apply-slave-statements
options.description: Include STOP SLAVE prior to CHANGE MASTER statement and START SLAVE at end of output

options.title: --bind-address=ip_address
options.description: Use specified network interface to connect to MySQL Server

options.title: --character-sets-dir=dir_name
options.description: Directory where character sets are installed

options.title: --column-statistics
options.description: Write ANALYZE TABLE statements to generate statistics histograms

options.description: Add comments to dump file

options.title: --comments, -i
options.description: Add comments to dump file

options.title: --compact
options.description: Produce more compact output

options.title: --compatible=name
options.description: Produce output that is more compatible with other database systems or with older MySQL servers

options.title: --complete-insert, -c
options.description: Use complete INSERT statements that include column names

options.title: --complete-insert, -c
options.description: Use complete INSERT statements that include column names

options.description: Compress all information sent between client and server

options.description: Compress all information sent between client and server

options.title: --compression-algorithms=value
options.description: Permitted compression algorithms for connections to server

options.title: --create-options
options.description: Include all MySQL-specific table options in CREATE TABLE statements

options.title: --databases, -B
options.description: Interpret all name arguments as database names

options.title: --databases, -B
options.description: Interpret all name arguments as database names

options.title: --debug[=debug_options], -# [debug_options]
options.description: Write debugging log

options.title: --debug-check
options.description: Print debugging information when program exits

options.title: --debug-info
options.description: Print debugging information, memory, and CPU statistics when program exits

options.title: --default-auth=plugin
options.description: Authentication plugin to use

options.title: --default-character-set=charset_name
options.description: Specify default character set

options.description: Read named option file in addition to usual option files

options.title: --defaults-file=file_name
options.description: Read only named option file

options.title: --defaults-group-suffix=str
options.description: Option group suffix value

options.description: On a replication source server, delete the binary logs after performing the dump operation

options.title: --delete-source-logs
options.description: On a replication source server, delete the binary logs after performing the dump operation

options.description: For each table, surround INSERT statements with statements to disable and enable keys

options.title: --disable-keys, -K
options.description: For each table, surround INSERT statements with statements to disable and enable keys

options.title: --dump-date
options.description: Include dump date as "Dump completed on" comment if --comments is given

options.description: Include CHANGE REPLICATION SOURCE TO statement that lists binary log coordinates of replica's source

options.description: Include CHANGE MASTER statement that lists binary log coordinates of replica's source

options.title: --enable-cleartext-plugin
options.description: Enable cleartext authentication plugin

options.description: Dump events from dumped databases

options.description: This option is used with the --tab option and has the same meaning as the corresponding clause for LOAD DATA

options.description: This option is used with the --tab option and has the same meaning as the corresponding clause for LOAD DATA

options.description: Continue even if an SQL error occurs during a table dump

options.description: Append warnings and errors to named file

options.title: --max-allowed-packet=value
options.description: Maximum packet length to send to or receive from server

options.description: Buffer size for TCP/IP and socket communication

options.description: Enclose the INSERT statements for each dumped table within SET autocommit = 0 and COMMIT statements

options.description: Do not dump table contents

options.description: Do not dump table contents

options.description: Do not add a DROP TABLE statement before each CREATE TABLE statement

options.description: Do not add comments to dump file

options.description: Do not produce more compact output

options.title: --skip-disable-keys
options.description: Do not disable keys

options.title: --skip-extended-insert
options.description: Turn off extended-insert

options.title: --skip-mysql-schema
options.description: Do not drop the mysql schema

options.title: --skip-opt
options.description: Turn off options set by --opt

options.title: --skip-quick
options.description: Do not retrieve rows for a table from the server a row at a time

options.title: --skip-quote-names
options.description: Do not quote identifiers

options.title: --skip-set-charset
options.description: Do not write SET NAMES statement

options.title: --skip-triggers
options.description: Do not dump triggers
